required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Outcomes Following Total Joint Replacement With Corin Prostheses: Corin MetaFix Collared Stem
clinical_study.official_title: Clinical Outcomes Following Total Joint Replacement With Corin Prostheses : Trinity™ Cup and MetaFix™ Collared Stem

brief_summary.textblock: Assessment of the clinical performance and survivorship of the Corin Total Hip System with Trinity™ cup MetaFix™ Collared stem in a prospective study. The primary endpoint of the study is to evaluate the 3-year survivorship and clinical performance of the Corin Total Hip System using Trinity™ cup and MetaFix™ Collared stem. Additionally, the study follow up will continue until 10 years for subjects who consent to do.

detailed_description.textblock:
The primary objective is the 3-year survivorship of the study devices.
The Secondary Objectives include:
- The improvement of clinical outcomes:
- Oxford Hip Score (OHS) up to 10-year follow-up
- Harris Hip Score (HHS) up to 10-year follow-up
- Hip disability and Osteoarthritis Outcome Score (HOOS) up to 10-year follow-up
- Safety performance monitoring including hip- and device-related AEs and the revision rate up to 10-year follow-up

primary_outcome.measure: Post operative survivorship of MetaFix Collared Stem at 3-year follow-up

secondary_outcome.measure: Oxford Hip Score (OHS) up to 10-year follow-up
secondary_outcome.description: OHS is a patient-centered questionnaire that is designed to assess functional ability and pain from the patient's perspective. It is a short, twelve-item questionnaire developed for completion by patients undergoing THA

secondary_outcome.measure: Harris Hip Score (HHS) up to 10-year follow-up
secondary_outcome.description: HHS is a disease-specific scoring system, originally intended as an outcome score after arthroplasty surgeries that includes the domains of function, pain, motion and deformity

secondary_outcome.measure: Hip disability and Osteoarthritis Outcome Score (HOOS) up to 10-year follow-up
secondary_outcome.description: The validated HOOS questionnaire is designed for patients with hip Osteoarthritis, it consists of 40 questions which assesses Pain, Symptoms, Activities of Daily Living, Sport and Recreational and Hip related Quality of life

secondary_outcome.measure: Hip- and device-related adverse events up to 10-year follow-up
secondary_outcome.description: All hip-related and device-related complications, including those occurring during the surgical procedure and throughout the postoperative evaluations, are required to be documented and reviewed

secondary_outcome.measure: Post operative survivorship of MetaFix Collared Stem at 10-year follow-up
MetaFix Collared Stem radiographic performance up to 10-years
secondary_outcome.description: Radiographic assessment considering radiolucent lines, stem alignment, heterotopic ossifications, osteolysis.

intervention.description: Patients received the MetaFix Collared stem during there Total Hip Arthroplasty

study_pop.textblock: Patients requiring a THR were identified and screened according to the Indications for use and the contraindications for implantation of the MetaFix™ collared femoral stem and the Trinity™ acetabular cup were invited to consent to the study. No specific exclusion criteria were defined for this study.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients requiring a THR
Exclusion Criteria:
-
